pages.title: Artron Capacitor
pages.text: Upgraded form of the medium capacitor. Stores up to 256 AU per capacitor, for a total of 2,560 AU, and a recharge rate of 1.5. Almost required for frequent flying. Can be upgraded into one of two penultimate capacitors.

pages.title: Artron Battery
pages.text: Upgraded form of the medium battery. Can hold up to 1,500 AU per battery, with a charge rate of 2.0, and a discharge rate of 0.25. Can be upgraded into one of two penultimate batteries.
